fix_description:
Created complete PIN registration system for new users. Added /register-pin.html with:
- User-friendly PIN creation interface (4-digit numeric PIN)
- Optional name and email fields
- Validation to prevent using reserved PINs (1776, 2025, 1234)
- Automatic workspace creation and localStorage setup
- Proper user profile storage

Updated navigation flows:
- beta-login.html: 'New User?' link now goes to /register-pin.html
- screening.html: 'Enter Workspace' now goes to /register-pin.html
- access.html: 'Don't have a PIN?' link now goes to /register-pin.html

New users can now self-register without needing to contact support or receive PIN via email.
